title: Strengthening Web Development Practice Competencies: Iterative Tracking and Estimation Design for Multi-Agent Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Linear Systems Control Basics, Graph Theory Fundamentals, and MATLAB/Python Simulation Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: One can design a controller that tracks dynamic leaders using only neighboring agent state information via distributed iterative learning laws.
One can mathematically prove the stability and convergence of a controller by applying Lyapunov-Krasovskii theory.
One can implement a local observer to reconstruct unmeasured states in partially observable systems and evaluate tracking performance.
One can submit project outcomes identifying unknown leader inputs and optimizing system performance through distributed control simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
